name: @dandiandy/mapbox-gl-draw-snap-rectangle
description: A custom mode for MapboxGL Draw to draw rectangles that adds the functionality of keeping the rectangle's shape when adjusting a corner of the drawn rectangle, originally modified by teamookla (https://github.com/teamookla/mapbox-gl-draw-rectangle-mode). This version works with the snap mode library created by mhsattarian (https://github.com/mhsattarian/mapbox-gl-draw-snap-mode).
author: DandiAndy
